channel.title: AK’s Beat Contest [For Fun 👌]
channel.description:
**Rules**
* You must use the beat you choose as your main beat in your track * Must be under (or around) the 2 minute mark * You can only edit very minor aspects of the beat. * When you post your submission, tell which beat you used
**Beats :0** Future bass/edm https://app.auxy.co/projects/rD2bHW8hcg-zcQEZyBrCSw== Drum and Bass https://app.auxy.co/projects/sOShw3ZyfWH24h2us4V7wA== House/Electro ish thing https://app.auxy.co/projects/dbHXQpKm88A-j-nu7rRFdg== Trap/HipHop https://app.auxy.co/projects/odYgD_uolY9OZxwYXnjTTQ== Idk https://app.auxy.co/projects/2gFCUZfLhj5v5Xw7G5s3aA== *If you use this you have a higher chance of winning, but only if it is used nicely 👌* Jungle House https://app.auxy.co/projects/WWivK-b_wKN2rSI1iFLOeA==

item.title: AK’s Beat Contest [For Fun 👌]
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
Yeah i just did it a few more times. same project. Weird tho because when i click on any of the other projects, i get the same project file: “Moody Albatross” with Fringe as the kit and 2 loops.

Might be a glitch of some sort seeing as all the url’s are different, but they ended up copying the same file.

Read full topic

item.title: AK’s Beat Contest [For Fun 👌]
item.dc:creator: El1011
item.description:
I’m down. Gimme dat DnB

its actually more Dubstep since the kick & snare hit on the 1 & 3 and b/c the tempo is 155. But if u bump it up to dnb tempo (160-180. 174 master bpm) then you got some drumstep.

Read full topic
